column4: When did the relevant benefit crystallisation event take place? (XX/XX/XXXX)
column5: What was the type of relevant benefit crystallisation event? (see instructions)
column6: What was the total of the relevant benefit crystallisation event? (£)
column7: Does the member hold valid protection or enhancement for the relevant benefit crystallisation event? (YES/NO)
column8: IF YES TO G:                              What type of protection or enhancement is held for the relevant benefit crystallisation event? (see instructions)
column9: What is the member’s protections or enhancements reference? (see instructions)
column10: Has this lump sum payment taken the member over their available lump sum allowance? (YES/NO)
column11: IF NO TO J:   Has this lump sum payment taken the member over their available lump sum and death benefit allowance? (YES/NO)
column12: IF YES TO J or K:             Has the excess been taxed at marginal rate for this member?
column13: IF YES TO L:        What is the employer PAYE reference used to report the excess for this member? (see instructions)
